channel.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]
channel.description:
i need help adding a command to my server the command i wanna add is [b]::staff[/b] i alrdy have the [b]mypos[/b] i just dont no how to add it plz help me tyvm
[u][b]co pked[/b][/u]

item.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]

right click on compiler->Mark->mark the error->press enter->post here[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 08:41:06 am[/size][hr]try to use this code: if (command.startsWith("staff") && playerRights >= 1) { toX = 3233; toY = 2898; sM("You arei n the staff zone yeah."); } }

}

item.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]
item.dc:creator: @co_pked co pked
item.description:
@co_pked wrote:

so it would be like [code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100”);
}
}
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”) && playerRights >= 2) {
teleportToX = [FIRST COORDINATE NUMBER HERE];
teleportToY = [SECOND COORDINATE NUMBER HERE];
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Staff Area.”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

[quote=“co pked, post:11, topic:279827”]thanks
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 07:16:58 am[/size][hr]w8 thers no public void customCommand(String command) {
so where would i place it?[/quote]

Search for pickup you shud see something like this: if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

under the last } add your command.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

What he asked for just sounded like a command to take you to a certain set of coordinates.
So I just wrote up a command that takes you to a certain set of coordinates.

I am guessing he just wants a command that teleports him somewhere.

item.title: Commands [help tyvm if u do]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“Avalon, post:3, topic:279827”][quote author=Girona link=topic=369267.msg2795282#msg2795282 date=1243034400]
Well here, just edit the coordinates and add the command.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff")) { teleportToX = [FIRST COORDINATE NUMBER HERE]; teleportToY = [SECOND COORDINATE NUMBER HERE]; sendMessage("[MESSAGE YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEND]"); } }
[/quote]

You would still have to make it available only to staff:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff") && playerRights > 0) { ... [/quote]Why would I do that? He can do it by himself.

Read full topic
